title: Natchez Trace National Scenic Trail: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Owens Creek Waterfall Trail Closure  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Owens Creek Waterfall Trail Closure  The Owens Creek Trail and waterfall site at milepost 52.4, part of the Rocky Springs section of the National Scenic Trail, is closed due to safety concerns. For your safety, please observe posted closures.
